title: # 450 - Jeremiah Watkins & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Jeremiah Watkins. We talk about his new special “Family Reunion”, sobriety, revelations about his Dad, Texas, doing shows during Covid, and much more! 

 

Check out my new show “Go Big Show” Thursdays at 9pm PST on TBS! 

 

Jeremiah’s new special “Family Reunion” is available now on Amazon Prime! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Peacock - Home of Comedy. Get started for free at http://www.peacocktv.com and start streaming today. 

 

This episode is brought to you by Intuit TurboTax Live. File with the help of an expert or let an expert file for you at http://www.turbotax.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon. Get 15% off your order at https://www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Magic Spoon. Go to http://www.magicspoon.com/bert to grab a variety pack and use our promo code BERT at checkout to get free shipping.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Tushy. Go to http://www.hellotushy.com/BERTCAST to get 10% off your order and FREE shipping

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
